channel.title: Dragon History client problem
channel.description:
Im using dragon history client and whenever i try to run it i get this error:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/abkyzt.png[/img]
Also this is what i have in my run.bat:
@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ Java -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
And this is what i have downloaded for java.....:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2aj6mfq.png[/img]
Could somebody please help me with this? I'm not sure what kind of error this is or what to do.

item.title: Dragon History client problem
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

That means it cannot find the main class that initiliazes your client. Usually this is the client class, but is can also be the gui class. To find out what to do, simply search in your client’s class files and see if you find either gui or client. If you find both you will have to do a manually look inside of both and see which one has a method for initiliazing the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon History client problem
item.dc:creator: @djs15 djs15
item.description:
@djs15 wrote:

How do i check what i have? do you mean what the source has? or what my computer has? if you mean what my computer has where do i search for it?

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon History client problem
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

search your files and make sure you have Gui and not EGUI or gui or something along the “gui” lines if so then for instance change the run.bat part from @echo off title Client cd ./Class/ Java -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

to

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ Java -Xmx500m EGUI 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

or whatever you have simply change it from Gui to that, hope this helps

Read full topic
